title: Rotational inertia rank - 3 axes on a rectangle

content.question: The figure shows a narrow, uniform rectangular plate. The plate can rotate about any of three axes that are each perpendicular to the plane of the figure and pass through one of the points <math alttext="P sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>P</mtext><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>P</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, or <math alttext="P sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>P</mtext><mn>3</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the rotational inertias <math alttext="I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="I sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> of the plate about points <math alttext="P sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>P</mtext><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>P</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="P sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>P</mtext><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub 1 equals I sub 2, which equals I sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub 1 is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub 2 equals I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub 2 is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub 2 is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
